title: unclean shutdown causes op geth to freeze when attempting to start up again

labels.name: P-unconfirmed
labels.description: Issue might be valid, but it’s not yet confirmed

body:
<!--
Need help?
Refer to our contributing guidelines for additional information about making a good issue:
https://github.com/ethereum-optimism/.github/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md
-->

**Describe the bug**
Spun up a OP stack chain and ran into issues getting it back up again

Seems like the console outputs

INFO [04-01|02:59:37.943] Loaded most recent local block           number=0 hash=314f12..2e2b0f td=0 age=1d5h19m
WARN [04-01|02:59:37.943] Failed to load snapshot                  err="missing or corrupted snapshot"
INFO [04-01|02:59:37.943] Rebuilding state snapshot 
INFO [04-01|02:59:37.944] Initialising Ethereum protocol           network=1,317,131 dbversion=<nil>
INFO [04-01|02:59:37.944] Resuming state snapshot generation       root=05dcfb..ca0583 accounts=0 slots=0 storage=0.00B dangling=0 elapsed="238.721µs"
... misc
WARN [04-01|02:59:37.945] Error reading unclean shutdown markers   error="leveldb: not found"
WARN [04-01|02:59:37.945] Engine API enabled                       protocol=eth
....misc
and then hangs on
INFO [04-01|03:01:42.749] Transaction pool price threshold updated price=0
INFO [04-01|03:01:42.749] Updated mining threads                   threads=0
INFO [04-01|03:01:42.749] Transaction pool price threshold updated price=1,000,000,000

Op-node returns 

ERROR[04-01|03:02:28.691] failed to fetch runtime config data      err="failed to fetch unsafe block signing address from system config: failed to fetch proof of storage slot 0x65a7ed542fb37fe237fdfbdd70b31598523fe5b32879e307bae27a0bd9581c08 at block 0xf91d6423e214b77bd648aa1cdd479284dde63a2376720ef36de48330d4585512: invalid argument 2: hex number > 64 bits"
ERROR[04-01|03:02:29.059] Error initializing the rollup node       err="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"
ERROR[04-01|03:02:29.059] Unable to create the rollup node         error="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"
CRIT [04-01|03:02:29.059] Application failed                       message="failed to load runtime configuration repeatedly"


**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Have everything running
2. ctrl + c to shutdown the process
3. restart geth and face errors

**Expected behavior**
Geths starts and allows you to start op-node and batcher

**Screenshots**
If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem.

**System Specs:**
 - OS: Ubuntu Linux i3 AWS instance
